blocks.name: cprrng
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of prime rings.

blocks.name: cdmn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of domains.

blocks.name: df-prrngo
blocks.content: Define the class of prime rings. A ring is prime if the zero ideal is a prime ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: df-dmn
blocks.content: Define the class of (integral) domains. A domain is a commutative prime ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: isprrngo
blocks.content: The predicate "is a prime ring". (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm isprrngo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cprrng), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(cpridl, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c2))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cprrng, crngo, wcel(csn(c1), cfv(cpridl, c0)), wcel(csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cpridl, cv(hs0))))
  eleq12d(csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cpridl, cv(hs0)), csn(c1), cfv(cpridl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(cgi, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(c1st, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1st)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cpridl)
  df-prrngo(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crngo)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(csn(c1), cfv(cpridl, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isprrngo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PrRing ↔(c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ { c1 } ∈(PrIdl ` c0)))
  ⊣ c2 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(GId ` c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cprrng, crngo, { c1 } ∈(PrIdl ` c0), {(GId `(1st ` hs0))} ∈(PrIdl ` hs0))
  eleq12d({(GId `(1st ` hs0))}, (PrIdl ` hs0), { c1 }, (PrIdl ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  sneqd((GId `(1st ` hs0)), c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((GId `(1st ` hs0)), c1, (GId ` c2), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cgi, (1st ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((1st ` hs0), c2, (1st ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c1st)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cpridl)
  df-prrngo(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crngo)
  diff.hs0.w({ c1 } ∈(PrIdl ` c0))
}

blocks.name: prrngorngo
blocks.content: A prime ring is a ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: smprngopr
blocks.content: A simple ring (one whose only ideals are ` 0 ` and ` R ` ) is a prime ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm smprngopr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(c0, cprrng))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c5))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(c0, cprrng), wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cpridl, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)))
  mpbir3and(w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cpridl, c0)), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(csn(c2), c3), wral(hs3, cfv(cidl, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2)))))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cidl, c0)))
  0idl(c0, c2, c4)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wne(csn(c2), c3))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wne(csn(c2), c3))
  necon3bid(c1, c2, csn(c2), c3, wcel(c0, crngo))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(csn(c2), c3), wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c3, csn(c2)))
  0rngo(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  eqcom(c1, c2)
  eqcom(csn(c2), c3)
  ralrimivv(hs3, hs2, cfv(cidl, c0), cfv(cidl, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2)))))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cidl, c0))), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2)))), wa(wo(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cidl, c0))), wa(wo(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)))))
  sylbi(wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cidl, c0))), wa(wo(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)))), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))))
  eqeq2i(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3)))
  df-pr(csn(c2), c3)
  syl6bb(wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cidl, c0))), wa(wo(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))), wcel(cv(hs2), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3)))))

  eleq2(cfv(cidl, c0), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3)), cv(hs3))

  elun(cv(hs3), csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))

  velsn(hs3, csn(c2))
  velsn(hs3, c3)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs2), cun(csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)), wo(wcel(cv(hs2), csn(csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), csn(c3))))
  elun(cv(hs2), csn(csn(c2)), csn(c3))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs2), csn(csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), csn(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  velsn(hs2, csn(c2))
  velsn(hs2, c3)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wi(wa(wo(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2))))))
  ccased(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2)))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2)), wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2))), wi(wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2))))))

  adantr(wceq(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(c2)), wo(wss(cv(hs3), csn(c2)), wss(cv(hs2), csn(c2))))

blocks.pretty:
thm smprngopr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c3 })→ c0 ∈ PrRing)
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran(c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(GId ` c5)
} = {

blocks.name: divrngpr
blocks.content: A division ring is a prime ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm divrngpr(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, cprrng))
} = {
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, cprrng), wcel(c0, crngo), wne(cfv(cgi, cfv(c2nd, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0))), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0))), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(cres(cfv(c2nd, c0), cxp(cdif(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))), cdif(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))))), cgr))
  isdrngo1(c0, cfv(c2nd, c0), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  dvrunz(c0, cfv(cgi, cfv(c2nd, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  divrngidl(c0, cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  smprngopr(c0, cfv(cgi, cfv(c2nd, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(c2nd, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divrngpr(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRingOps → c0 ∈ PrRing)
} = {
  syl3anc(c0 ∈ DivRingOps, c0 ∈ PrRing, c0 ∈ RingOps, (GId `(2nd ` c0))≠(GId `(1st ` c0)), (Idl ` c0)= { {(GId `(1st ` c0))}, ran((1st ` c0))})
  simplbi(c0 ∈ DivRingOps, c0 ∈ RingOps, ((2nd ` c0)|`((ran((1st ` c0))\ {(GId `(1st ` c0))})×(ran((1st ` c0))\ {(GId `(1st ` c0))})))∈ GrpOp)
  isdrngo1(c0, (2nd ` c0), ran((1st ` c0)), (GId `(1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))
  dvrunz(c0, (GId `(2nd ` c0)), (GId `(1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0), ran((1st ` c0)))
  divrngidl(c0, (GId `(1st ` c0)), ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  smprngopr(c0, (GId `(2nd ` c0)), (GId `(1st ` c0)), ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  eqid((2nd ` c0))
  eqid(ran((1st ` c0)))
  eqid((GId `(1st ` c0)))
  eqid((GId `(2nd ` c0)))
}
